name: Stable Inc. (FedoraArg)
description:
A fast-paced game about stealing the Stability® Core out of a Nuclear Power Plant. As reality collapses around the area, you must escape through a portal before it's too late!

Features:

  • Randomly generated rooms, pickups and enemy placement.
  • Chaotic modifiers that will make the game harder as you progress.
  • Estimated play time: As fast as you can (or ~12 minutes)

Credits:

  •  Angela Cobos (art, SFX, game design)
  • Joaquín León (programming, UI, game design)

Music:

  • aldermansweden (Stealth Escape, Creepy Night)
  • bensound.com (Moose)
  • Nielizas (Breeze)
  • John Sib (Funky Trap Sax)
